newsitem.title: TAIWAN: Land Bank of Taiwan cuts prime lending rate.
newsitem.headline: Land Bank of Taiwan cuts prime lending rate.

text.p: Land Bank of Taiwan said on Friday it would cut its prime lending rate by 0.025 percentage points to 7.275 following a string of minor interest rate cuts by the island's major commercial banks.
The Land Bank also would reduce its various time and saving deposit rates by 0.10-0.20 percentage points, effective from Saturday.
The interest rate reductions were to reflect loose liquidity in the banking system, the banks have said.
